https://tmrev.io/movie/764828-A Lionel Christmas 2 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3edYxVJmJWuEnHI4yATXQFTbzh7.jpg Christmas morning memories captured in a series of incredible locations - including Rockefeller Center, a home where Christmas trains and decorations fill every room, an around-the-tree layout featuring the Polar Express, the Lionel Christmas layout on the NBC Today Show, the Christmas displays at Macy's, Grand Central Terminal, and FAO Schwarz. Pure holiday enchantment. A Lionel Christmas 2
